🎮💻 #CIV7 GIVEAWAY! 💻🎮

To celebrate the launch of Civilization VII we’re teaming up with @Civgame to treat FIVE (5) lucky winners with the ultimate gamer giveaway!

PRIZE:
🏰 One (1) copy of Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Founders Edition
🏰 Smarties 'Conquer the Day' Snack Pack

TO ENTER:
🗺️ Follow @Civgame + @Smarties
🗺️ Like and save this post
🗺️ Tag a friend and use #civ7
 
ABBREVIATED RULES. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Sweepstakes is open only to legal residents of the forty-eight (48) contiguous United States and District of Columbia and are eighteen (18) years of age or older at time of entry. Begins 02/26/25 at approximately 11:00:00 AM (ET) and ends 03/03/25 at 11:59:59 PM (ET). For details on how to enter and/or for complete Official Rules, go to https://www.smarties.com/Civilization-7-Sweepstakes. Entry is free. Subject to complete Official Rules. Void in AK, HI and where otherwise prohibited. Sponsor: Smartie Candy Company, 1091 Lousons Rd, Union, NJ 07083.
